definitions: (of a liquid) having been purified by undergoing heating and condensation
shortDefinitions: (of liquid) having been purified by undergoing heating and condensation

definitions: (of spirits or an essence) produced by distilling

examples.text: the distilled whiskey is filtered through 3 meters of charcoal

shortDefinitions: (of spirits or essence) produced by distilling

definitions: having been shortened so that only the essential meaning or most important aspects remain

examples.text: the report is a distilled version of the main accounts

shortDefinitions: having been shortened so that only essential meaning or most important aspects remain
